recipes.title: Blueberry Muffins
recipes.description: Soft and fluffy muffins packed with fresh, juicy blueberries, perfect for breakfast or a snack.

recipes.title: Strawberry Shortcake
recipes.description: A delightful dessert made with layers of sweet strawberries, fluffy whipped cream, and tender shortcake.

recipes.title: Vegetable Chicken Soup
recipes.description: A comforting and hearty soup made with tender chicken, fresh vegetables, and flavorful broth.
